article-meta.issue-title: Fifty Years Beyond the Brink: Writing the Cuban Missile Crisis

body.p: Adenauer, Konrad: West German Chancellor, 1949-63.
Anderson, Admiral George: US Chief of Naval Operations, 1961-63.
Anderson, Major Rudolf: U-2 pilot shot down and killed on Saturday 27 October 1962.
Arkhipov, Second Captain Vasilii: Chief of Staff, 69th submarine brigade, who served aboard Soviet submarine B-59 during the Cuban Missile Crisis.
Ball, George: US National Security Advisor and Under-Secretary of State, 1961-66.
Bissell, Richard: CIA Deputy Director of Plans, 1959-62.
Bligh, Sir Tim, UK Principal Private Secretary to the Prime Minister, 1961-64.
Bruce, David: US Ambassador to the UK, 1961-69.
Bundy, McGeorge: US Special Assistant to the President for National Security Affairs 1961-66.
Butler, Richard ‘Rab’: UK Home Secretary, 1957-62.
Caccia, Sir Harold: UK Permanent Under-Secretary, Foreign Office, 1962-65.
Carter, General Marshall ‘Pat’: CIA Deputy Director of Intelligence, 1962-65.
Fidel Castro, Prime Minister/President and Commander-in-Chief Cuban armed forces, 1960-2008.
de Gaulle, General Charles, French President, 1958-69.
de Zulueta, Philip: Private Secretary to the Prime Minister, 1955-64.
Dean, Sir Patrick: UK Ambassador to the UN, 1960-64.
Diefenbaker, John: Prime Minister of Canada, 1957-63.
Dobrynin, Anatoli: Soviet Ambassador to the United States, 1962-86.
Eisenhower, Dwight D.: US President, 1953-61.
Feklisov, Aleksandr (cover name Fomin): KGB Rezident, Washington 1960-64.
Finletter, Thomas: US Ambassador to NATO, 1961-65.
Fulbright, William: US Chairman of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, 1959-74.
Gaitskell, Hugh: Leader of the UK Labour Party, 1955-63.
Garbuz, General Leonid: Deputy Commander Soviet Forces in Cuba, 1962.
Gribkov, General Anatoli: Soviet General Staff Officer centrally involved in Operation Anadyr.
Gromyko, Andrei: Soviet Foreign Minister, 1957-86.
Harvey, William: Chief CIA Task Force W, Operation Mongoose, 1961-2.
Heath, Edward: UK Lord Privy Seal, 1960-63.
Helms, Richard: CIA Deputy Director for Plans, 1962-65.
Hilsman, Roger: Director, Bureau of Intelligence and Research, Department of State, 1961-63.
Home, Lord (later Sir Alec Douglas-Home), UK Foreign Secretary, 1960-63.
Ivanov, Yevgeny: Soviet London naval attaché and military intelligence officer.
Keating, Kenneth: US Senator for New York, 1959-65.
Kennedy, John F.: US President, 1961-63.
Kennedy, Robert: US Attorney-General, 1961-64.
Kent, Sherman: Chairman, Board of National Estimates, CIA, 1952-67.
Khrushchev, Nikita: First Secretary, Central Committee Communist Party of the Soviet Union 1953-64 and Soviet Premier, 1958-64.
Kilmuir, Lord: Lord Chancellor of Great Britain, 1954-62.
Kornienko, Georgii: Counsellor in the Soviet Embassy at the time of the missile crisis.
LeMay, General Curtis: USAF Chief of Staff, 1961-65.
Lundahl, Arthur: Founder/Director, U.S. National Photographic Interpretation Center, 1961-73.
Macleod, Iain: UK Leader of the House of Commons, 1961-3.
Macmillan, Harold: UK Prime Minister, 1957-63.
McCone, John: Director of Central Intelligence, 1961-65.
McNamara, Robert: US Secretary of Defense, 1961-8.
Malinovski, Marshal Rodion: Soviet Minister of Defence, 1957-67.
Mikoyan, Anastas: Soviet First Deputy Prime Minister, 1955-64.
Nitze, Paul: US Assistant Secretary of Defense for International Security Affairs, 1961-63.
Norstad, General Lauris: NATO Supreme Allied Commander Europe, 1956-63.
Orlov, Vadim: Soviet communications officer, B-59 submarine.
Ormsby-Gore, David: UK Ambassador to the United States, 1961-65.
Penkovsky, Colonel Oleg: Soviet Military Intelligence officer who spied for the CIA and SIS 1961-62.
Pliyev, General Issa: Commander, Soviet Forces in Cuba, 1962.
Power, General Thomas: Commander-in-Chief, Strategic Air Command, 1957-64.
Rusk, Dean: US Secretary of State, 1961-69.
Russell, Richard: US Chairman of the Senate Armed Services Committee, 1951-3, 1955-69.
Savitskii, Captain Vitalii: commander of the Soviet B-59 submarine.
Scali, John: ABC News correspondent, 1961-71.
Shoup, General David: Commandant US Marine Corps, 1960-63.
Sorensen, Theodore: US Special Counsel to the President, 1960-64.
Stevenson, Adlai : US Ambassador to the UN, 1961-65.
Strong, Major-General Kenneth: Director UK Joint Intelligence Bureau, 1948-64.
Taylor, General Maxwell: Chairman, US Joint Chiefs of Staff, 1962-64.
Thant, U: Acting Secretary-General of the United Nations, 1961-62 (Secretary-General of the UN, 1962-71).
Thompson, Llewellyn: US Ambassador at Large, 1962-66.
Thorneycroft, Peter: UK Defence Secretary, 1962-64.
Trend, Sir Burke: UK Cabinet Secretary and Head of the Home Civil Service, 1963-73.
Wheeler, General Earl: US Army Chief of Staff, 1962-64.
Zorin, Valerian: Soviet Ambassador to the United Nations, 1960-63.
